abstract: Joe Kovacs wins gold medal in men's shot-put at track and field world championships.
lead_paragraph: Joe Kovacs of the United States won the gold medal in the men’s shot-put at the world championships in Beijing.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Track and Field; American Captures Shot-Put

snippet: Joe Kovacs of the United States won the gold medal in the men’s shot-put at the world championships in Beijing.
